summary: Young Jim Hawkins is torn between his loyalty to his benefactors and his affection for lovable rogue Long John Silver in their struggle to recover a buried pirate treasure.
cast: Wallace Beery|Jackie Cooper|Lionel Barrymore|Otto Kruger|Lewis Stone|Nigel Bruce|Charles 'Chic' Sale|William V. Mong|Charles McNaughton|Dorothy Peterson|Douglass Dumbrille|Edmund Breese|Olin Howland|Charles Irwin|Edward Pawley|Richard Powell|James Burke|John Anderson|Charles Bennett|Robert Adair|Robert Anderson|Bernice Beatty|Wilson Benge|Bruce Bennett|Red Berger|Robert Bolder|Ed Brady|Wes Clark|Cora Sue Collins|Harry Cording|Sidney D'Albrook|Jill Dennett|Kay Deslys|Billy Dooley|Vernon Downing|Frank Dunn|Harold Entwistle|Matt Gilman|Frank Hagney|Jack Hill|John Kerr|J.M. Kerrigan|Edith Kingdon|A.B. Lane|Tom Mahoney|Jim Mason|King Mojave|John Northpole|Ethel Ransome|Yorke Sherwood|Shirley Simpson|Robert R. Stephenson|Jane Talent|Hal Wilson|Tom Wilson
title: La isla del tesoro
